src:
Morilec Trstenovo menda pokončal s hrbta, streljal tudi na policiste
Ko so ga policisti obkolili, si je sodil sam.
05 Nov 2019, 12:47 by A. L.
SARAJEVO – Danes okoli 7. ure je bila v sarajevski Aleji Bosne srebrene umorjena Sanela Trsten, ena od izstreljenih krogel pa je zadela tudi Senado Muhić iz podjetja Park, pred katerim se je zločin zgodil. Morilec je po poročanju portala Avaz Nedžad Čaušević, Sanela, ki jo je po poročanju nekaterih medijev ustrelil v hrbet, pa je bila njegova partnerica. Portal haber.ba poroča, da gre najverjetneje za zločin iz ljubosumja. V streljanju je bilo uporabljeno avtomatsko orožje, točo krogel pa je Čaušević poslal tudi proti pripadnikom policije in specialne enote. Sprva se mu je uspelo policistom izmuzniti, a so ga ti ob pomoči šolanih psov izsledili in obkolili. Čaušević si je nato sodil sam.
text:
The assassin allegedly knocked Trsten from the back and fired at the police
When he was surrounded by police, he judged himself.
05 Nov 2019, 12:47 by A.L.
SARAJEVO - Sanela Trsten was murdered in Sarajevo's Alley of Bosnia today, around 7 a.m., and one of the bullets also struck Senada Muhić from the Park Company, before whom the crime took place. The killer reportedly was Avaz Nedzad Causevic, and Sanela, who was shot in the back by some media, was his partner. Haber.ba reports that it is most likely a crime of jealousy. The machine gun was used in the shooting, and Čaušević also sent a bullet to the police and a special unit. At first, he managed to get out of the police, but with the help of trained dogs, he was tracked down and surrounded. Causevic then judged himself.
